headerModalSignuppasswordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one capital letter
assistantGreeting: Hi, how can I help you?
startModalDescription: Choose a subscription model to get started on your studies
startModalMentordesc1: Full access to 3 courses' syllabus and services
startModalMentordesc2: Best for improving skills in specific courses
startModalPremiumdesc1: Complete access to all courses (HHX, STX, HTX)
startModalCustomdesc1: Study plan tailored to your custom syllabus
welcomeDescription1: Discover a revolutionary way to complete your high school education - faster, smarter, and more engaging than ever before. With OneMonth, you can complete STX, HHX, or HTX in just one month of full-time study.
welcomeDescription2: Our unique AI-powered learning system adapts to your personal strengths and challenges, enabling you to learn effectively and at your own pace. Choose from a wide range of subjects.
welcomeDescription3: Through gamification, your education becomes not just a learning process, but also an exciting journey. Collect points, unlock new avatars, accessories, and virtual trophies as you watch your progress and achievements grow.
welcomeDescription4: Our mentor and premium models offer extended access to subjects and personal support, ensuring that you get the most out of your time with us.
welcomeDescription5: With OneMonth, you're not alone. Our AI assistant is always ready to help with text, images, and voice input, continuously adapting to your preferences and learning style.
welcomeDescription6: Sign up now and experience an education tailored to the digital age, suited to your intelligence and learning style. Take the first step towards your future with OneMonth!
courseReadyPrompt: I am ready. Please start teaching me the course - preferably start with an introduction
courseContinuePrompt: Please continue teaching me the course
courseExplainPrompt: Please explain that again, differently, I am not sure I quite understand
